name: Beyond The Last Frontier
description:
Beyond The Last Frontier is a survival/management game, centered around the survival of a traper in Northern Alaska. The game features a crafting system, harvesting, shopping for equipment and selling ressources, traps for animal and hunting.

The game is a school project made at UQAC using an agile approach. We also wrote a complete Game Design Document before the actual development.

The team:

  • Arthur Pardieu
  • Clémence Petit
  • Agathe Cagin
  • Raphaelle Garcia

    • Programmed on Unity in C# in two months, Oct.2019 - Dec.2019.
